page.title: 13LIFE IN LIFTON
page.content: I have lived in{LIFTON}for fourteen years. We live in a council house which we are now buying. The council estate was built to{RE-HOUSE}people who lived in the main street. The main street was very narrow and they knocked down the houses to widen the road. Since then two more estates have have been built, {CHURCHLANDS }and{ {ARUNDELL GARDENS. {LIFTON}has many {CLUBS}for people to enjoy. I belong to{LIFTON BADMINTON {CLUB,}of which i am {CHAIRMAN.}I enjoy walking. There are many walks around{ {LIFTON}and along the{RIVER BANKS.} Altogether{LIFTON}is a very nice place to live in. We hope to be moving to the country-side next year.
